userMessage: How do I make a paper airplane?
assistantResponse: To make a paper airplane: 1) Take a sheet of 8.5x11 paper. 2) Fold it in half lengthwise, then unfold. 3) Fold the top corners to meet at the center crease. 4) Fold the angled edges to meet at the center again. 5) Fold the plane in half along the original crease. 6) Create wings by folding each side down to align with the bottom edge. Your paper airplane is ready to fly!
